page.title: 07Health Care
page.content: There is one doctor's surgery, complete with dispensary, in Sutton Benger. A Health Visitor from Chippenham conducts a Baby Clinic in the village hall once a month. In addition there are larger doctor's surgeries in Chippenham with whom locals can register. A full range of health care services are available through the Chippenham Health Clinic, and hospitals in Chippenham, Bath and Bristol. Dental and optical services are also found in Chippenham. The 17th century Greathouse at Kington Langley is a residential nursing home for the disabled. It is a member of the group of Cheshire Foundation Homes.
